title: Run E2E ingestion validation
description: Execute scripts/run_ingestion_via_agent_engine.sh. Verify: /ingestion_runs, /articles (20+), /briefs collections populated. Check Cloud Logging for full trace. Acceptance: End-to-end pipeline works.

title: Create Discord server and webhooks for perception demo
description: Create Discord server with channels: #daily-brief, #breaking-alerts, #tech-news, #industry-news, #system-status. Create webhooks, store URLs in Secret Manager. Acceptance: Webhooks functional.

title: Complete Terraform agent_runtime
description: Infrastructure as code for Agent Engine deployment, Cloud Run, Firestore. Acceptance: terraform apply provisions full stack.

title: Create initial test suite
description: Pytest tests for agent tools, MCP service endpoints, integration flows. Minimum 60% coverage on core paths. Acceptance: CI runs tests.

title: Add Gemini API calls to Agent 4
description: Implement executive_summary, highlights, strategic_implications using Vertex AI Gemini 2.0 Flash. Acceptance: Brief generation uses real AI.

title: Wire Agent 7 to Discord delivery for alerts
description: Add Discord alerts to storage pipeline: daily brief -> #daily-brief, high-relevance (>8.5) -> #breaking-alerts, run status -> #system-status. Acceptance: Automated flow working.

title: Add send_discord_alert MCP tool
description: Implement /mcp/tools/send_discord_alert endpoint in Cloud Run MCP service. Format embeds with title, content, URL, timestamp. Acceptance: Test alerts appear in Discord.

title: Wire dashboard to Firestore briefs
description: Connect DailyBriefs.tsx to /briefs collection. Display brief date, sections, key points. Acceptance: Briefs appear in dashboard.

title: Implement Agent 2 Topic Manager
description: Replace stubs with Firestore CRUD for /users/{user_id}/topics. Implement get_user_topics, add_topic, remove_topic, update_topic. Acceptance: Topics persist in Firestore.

title: Configure MCP_BASE_URL for Agent Engine
description: Research how ADK passes env vars to Agent Engine. Set MCP_BASE_URL=https://perception-mcp-348724539390.us-central1.run.app. Acceptance: Agents can call MCP service.

title: Audit rssatoms repo and integrate feeds with Discord demo
description: Audit ~/000-projects/rssatoms repo for RSS feed assets. Wire TIER1_BEST_FEEDS.csv and MASTER_ALL_FEEDS.csv into perception's ingestion pipeline. Set up Discord bot/webhook integration to demo real-time article alerts by inviting users to a Discord room. Reference bob's-brain for ADK patterns. Acceptance: Feeds from rssatoms flowing through perception, alerts visible in Discord.

title: Import 12 AI/Tech TIER1 feeds from rssatoms to perception
description: Add MIT AI, OpenAI, DeepMind, Hugging Face, etc. to rss_sources.yaml. Test with ingestion run. Acceptance: All 12 feeds harvesting successfully.

title: Implement Agent 5 Alert & Anomaly
description: Implement spike detection, sentiment analysis, anomaly detection. Acceptance: Alerts generated for significant events.

title: Implement remaining MCP tools
description: Implement fetch_api_feed, fetch_webpage, log_ingestion_run, send_notification. Acceptance: All 7 MCP tools functional.

title: Create Discord invite and welcome flow
description: Generate non-expiring invite link. Create welcome message explaining Perception, channels, update frequency. Acceptance: Single-click onboarding works.

title: Create rssatoms category to perception section mapping
description: Map rssatoms categories (AI Developer Tools, Data Science, etc.) to perception sections (tech, industry). Update Agent 3 scoring logic. Acceptance: Articles categorized correctly.

title: Deploy Agent Engine to Vertex AI
description: Execute scripts/deploy_agent_engine.sh, capture Agent ID from gcloud alpha aiplatform agents list, verify ACTIVE state. Acceptance: Agent deployed and ID documented.

title: Wire dashboard to Firestore articles
description: Add article listing component connected to /articles collection. Show title, source, score, section. Acceptance: Articles browsable in UI.

title: Implement MCP store_articles
description: Real Firestore batch writes with URL-based deduplication. Acceptance: Articles stored via MCP endpoint.

title: Add live ingestion status to dashboard
description: Connect SystemActivityCard to /ingestion_runs collection. Show last run time, article count, status. Acceptance: Real-time status visible.

title: Implement MCP generate_brief
description: Vertex AI Gemini integration for brief generation in MCP service. Acceptance: Briefs generated via MCP endpoint.

title: Document demo script for stakeholder presentations
description: Write step-by-step demo script: invite, show daily brief, show breaking alerts, explain sources, Q&A. Test with 1 stakeholder. Acceptance: Demo runs smoothly.
